channel.title: GitHub Trending - JavaScript (Weekly)

item.title: 📜 justlovemaki/Gemini-CLI-2-API (279 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: justlovemaki

📝 Repository: justlovemaki/Gemini-CLI-2-API

📄 Descrizione: GeminiCli2API：本地代理Gemini CLI，兼容OpenAI API，每日千次免费请求。通过API轻松接入任何客户端，让AI开发更高效！
